description: six floating shapes against a background of vertical stripes in blue, red, black with intrical floral pattern; shapes on top are two figures wearing bags on their heads with cut-out eyes, a cone shape in between the two figures; shapes on bottom are two circles with an oval inbetween; floating mount with mat window; in modern natural wood frame, UV filtering acrylic; D-rings and wire
markings: paper label C verso frame: DANIEL WEINBERG GALLERY / ALEXANDER GORLIZKI / Family Affair, 2006/ Pigment on paper / 7\" x 8 3/4\" / AG 105
title: Family Affair
